Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class LeaderCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.LeaderCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiscountLeaderCard, ProdPowerLeaderCard, StorageLeaderCard, WhiteMarbleLeaderCard
public abstract class LeaderCard
extends Card
If the card is initially unflipped it means it's on its face at the begging, it can't be used, isFlipped=false; When a card isFlipped it can be used.

    • activate

      public void activate() throws AlreadyActivatedLeaderCardException, AlreadyDiscardedLeaderCardException
      Activates leader card
      Throws:
      AlreadyActivatedLeaderCardException - if the leader card was already activated
      AlreadyDiscardedLeaderCardException - if the leader card was discarded

    • discard

      public void discard() throws AlreadyActivatedLeaderCardException, AlreadyDiscardedLeaderCardException
      Discards the leader card
      Throws:
      AlreadyActivatedLeaderCardException - if the leader card was activated
      AlreadyDiscardedLeaderCardException - if the leader card was already discarded

    • getCardType

      public CardType getCardType()

    • getCardActivationCostColours

      public java.util.List<LeaderCardCost> getCardActivationCostColours() throws WrongCardTypeException
      Returns:
      the activation cost of the leader card
      Throws:
      WrongCardTypeException - if the leader card is not a DISCOUNT, PRODUCTION or MARBLE leader card.

    • getStorageCardActivationCostResources

      public java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> getStorageCardActivationCostResources() throws WrongCardTypeException
      Returns:
      the activation cost of the STORAGE leader card type, as an hashMap of Resource, Integer
      Throws:
      WrongCardTypeException - if the card is not a STORAGE leader card type.

    • getLeaderCardPower

      public abstract java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> getLeaderCardPower()
      Returns:
      the hashMap corresponding to the leader card power

    • toPath

      public abstract java.lang.String toPath()
      This method transform a card to a String that represent the image name in the resources directory. It will be used to upload the image of the card in the GUI
      Returns:
      a String that will be used for the path of the image
